name: pastures_of_c3_plant_functional_types
description: Pastures are assumed to be anthropogenic in origin. They include anthropogenically managed pastureland and rangeland. A "c3 plant" is one that utilizes the C3 carbon fixation pathway as the sole mechanism to bind CO2 before photosynthesis reactions take place. All trees are C3 type. Grasses and crops can be C3 or C4.
